hooks.command: INPUT=$(cat); CWD=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r '.cwd // empty' 2>/dev/null); echo "$(date) PWD=$PWD CWD=$CWD PANE=$(tmux display-message -p '#{pane_id}' 2>/dev/null) BRANCH=$(cd "${CWD:-$PWD}" && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null)" >> /tmp/hook-debug.log; Q=$(cd "${CWD:-$PWD}" && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); Q=${Q#worktree-}; [ -n "$Q" ] && { T=$(tmux display-message -p '#{pane_title}' 2>/dev/null); T="${T#$Q - }"; tmux select-pane -T "$Q - $T" 2>/dev/null; }; exit 0
